00001 /*
00002  *
00003  *  mshell .h -- Dynamic memory handler interface
00004  *
00005  *  Description: mshell.h provides the interface definitions for the
00006  *  dynamic memory handler.
00007  *  See mshell.c for complete documentation.
00008  *
00009  */
00010 
00011 
00012 /* Compilation options */
00013 #define MEM_LIST        /* Build internal list */
00014 #define MEM_WHERE       /* Keep track of memory block source */
00015 
00016 /* Interface functions */
00017 unsigned long   Mem_Used(void);
00018 void            Mem_Display(FILE *);
00019 
00020 /* Interface functions to access only through macros */
00021 #if defined(MEM_WHERE)
00022 void    *mem_alloc(size_t, char *, int);
00023 void    *mem_realloc(void *, size_t, char *, int);
00024 void     mem_free(void *, char *, int);
00025 char    *mem_strdup(char *, char *, int);
00026 #else
00027 void    *mem_alloc(size_t);
00028 void    *mem_realloc(void *, size_t);
00029 void     mem_free(void *);
00030 char    *mem_strdup(char *);
00031 #endif
00032 
00033 /* Interface macros */
00034 #if !defined(__MSHELL__)
00035 #if  defined(MEM_WHERE)
00036 #define malloc(a)       mem_alloc( (a), __FILE__, __LINE__ )
00037 #define realloc(a, b)   mem_realloc( (a), (b), __FILE__, __LINE__ )
00038 #define free(a)         mem_free( (a), __FILE__, __LINE__ )
00039 #define strdup(a)       mem_strdup( (a), __FILE__, __LINE__ )
00040 #define calloc(a, b)    malloc( ((a)*(b)) )
00041 #else
00042 #define malloc(a)       mem_alloc( (a) )
00043 #define realloc(a, b)   mem_realloc( (a), (b) )
00044 #define free(a)         mem_free( (a) )
00045 #define strdup(a)       mem_strdup( (a) )
00046 #endif
00047 #endif
